content.prompt: What was the purpose behind the publication of the 1840 illustration above?

choices.label: To attack William Henry Harrison for being a poor, uneducated farmer
To portray William Henry Harrison as a common man
To create support for the Populist movement
To encourage settlement of Indiana by German and Irish immigrants
To criticize the “log cabin” mentality and the manufacture of hard cider

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
